TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Slovakia, title = Slovakia, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slovakia} }

S.FORM: Slovakia kakilimaan u Slovakia sa i labu nu O-cuo, itiza i 48 40 N, 19 30 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 49,035 km2.u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 48,105 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 930 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa 5,445,802. kakalukan umah sa 40.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 40.20%, zumaay henay umah sa 19.70%. nilacul tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Bratislava . kakinginan nu kanatal demiad kakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 1 bulad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Zuzana Čaputová (Susanna．Caputuwa 蘇珊娜·查普托娃), 1973 a mihca 6 a bulad 21 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Slovakia ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2019 a mihca 6 bulad 15 demiad. cunli u cunli nu Slovakia ayza sa ci Eduard Heger , micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 4 bulad 1 demiad. Czechoslovakia likisi Czechoslovakia i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan katukuh i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1992) a mahcaan u O-cuo a kanatal, mabulesak satu tahekl ku tusaay misitekeday a kanatal — Czechia atu Czechoslovakia . Czechoslovakia patideng i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan, itida i Cuo-o , u Czechia atu Slovakia misakaput, tawyaay a kanatal nu ngangan u Slovensko , itini i cacay katukuh tu tusaay a nikalepacawan, tawya namaka celcel henay tu saka kitakit nu saka pitu a tabakiay nu kakakulian. itini i saka tusa anikalepacawan, Czechoslovakia a niyadu hiyan nu Nacuy-Dekuo midebung, itin i kakakuliyana nu kakitidaan patideng tu Bohemia atu Moravia dadiputen a kanatal atu Czechoslovakia nu tusaay a dadadimawan nu kanatal, duma a niyaduan hiyan nu Poland atu Hungary amikelic. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan,Czechoslovakia misumad tu ngangan u Czechoslovakia siakay cui kunhekuo. sumamadan a likisi Czechoslovakia a niyadu' itida i Ocuo nu teban, pisitekedan sa nuheni nama hiya nu Hapu-sepaw-wancaw patidenga tu Awtili-tikuo mikuwan makala tu tulu a pina (300) a lasubu ku tenes, cacay a malebut walu a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku pitu (1867) a mihcaan Awtlli-tikuo misumad tu kaput mala Aw'cun-tikuo , Czechia atu Slovakia niyadu' mikelic sipabeli i Austria atu Hungary . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan misatadas malepacaw tu hedek, Awcun-tikuo mademec mabulasak, Bohemia , Moravia , Slovakia a niyadu' misakaput misitekeday a kanatal, pangangan han u Czechoslovakia . misiteked satu kina kitakit, Czechoslovakia a sakaudip amelik satu mucelak, katukuh tu tusa anikalepacawan nu kanatal a ayawan, naytini i paykanatal nu saka cacay a bataan nu kakakulian a saka enem nu kasinganganan. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku walu (1938) a mihcaan, Ing-fa a kanatal atu Germany atu Italy masasulit tu Munich a kiyakuan a sasulitan, itini kainaian nu Czechoslovakia dayhiw milihida tu kawaw panutek tu nutipanay a lala' Sudetenland kelicen sipabeli i Germany . 1939年3月, . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku siwa (1939) a mihcaan tulu a bulad, Nazi Germany maalatu Sudetenland aniyadu nu likucu, tahekal ku hitay hamin han ku Czechoslovakia mialaw, Germany itini i Czechia patideng tu Bohemia atu Moravia madiputay a kanatal, Slovakia mapatideng mahiya nu Germany madiputay a Czechoslovakia . Slovakia a niyadu' pakilac sipabeli i Germany a cabay tu Hungary wan-kuo . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku lima (1945) a mihcaan, Su-lan pasayda i Dun-ou paculi, u Potsdam nika sasulitan tu Czechoslovakia namaka Prague nutipan hitay nu Amilika midebung, mapulung tu sudu Prague hiyan nu Su-lan a hitay madebung, Czechia atu Slovakia mapulung aca, kelican nu Germany atu Cun-yali ku lala' misabaluhayaca mibenis tu Czechoslovakia , nika Zakarpattia Oblast sipakelic i Soviet Union a Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic . cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku enem (1946) a mihcaan lima a bulat, Czechoslovakia itini i United States Soviet Union miliyas satu salihalay satu kunuheni misingkiw, kuncendan sayadahay ku nisingkiwan a paya tulu a bataan idaw ku walu tin enem a kilac(-38.6%), amica kuncendan ku satabakiay nu dan nika micukelay a tademaw caay ka papina, nika mihantaya tu kuncendan a pinapinanu centan caay ka balud ku balucu'. sakatusa a mihcaan, Slovakia nuudip a kawaw caay henay ka hedaek,sakaudip kangelu' an macunus kunikacaay ka hulak nu kawaw nika itini i Stalin mipenec makai tunipipadan nu United States , nina kuncendan sifu caay kanamuhi nu tademaw kaisa miduiy itini i cacay a malebut siw a lasubut sepat a bataan idaw ku walu (1948) a mihcaan lima a bulad miliyawaca misingkiw. nika tawyaay a mihcaan nu tusa a bulad, kasaupu nu sifu a dumaan nu tan a sakakaay patahekal tu sapiales, midademec tu kuncendan misa tabaki tu kincal misilud tu kakawawen, sisa mapalekal ku cence kabaliyawan, kuncendan masakaputay miawaw tu katuuday muculil palekal miyukiw tina kawawan. imahini u sakakaay katepaan i dadan a mapatay, katuuday sakamusa cinida niuculan nu sifu mipacuk, mahida tuwaca kuncendan palekal mibabelih, unuheni mikuwan tu aydaay nipisingkiwan, amica ku cungli caay sipaliyuni nika sifu mamin tu u kuncendan kusi kawaway. nika itini i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku walu (1948) a mihcaan tusa a bulad ninakawaw sa, mala Sulan a binawlan nu sehuw cui a kanatal, micumud tu Soviet Union patideng tu huasa sasulitan anikasakaput atu sakaudip papadang a wiyunhuw. 1960年, . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan Czechoslovakia misumad tu ngangan u Czechoslovak malabinawlanay a sakaputan nu kunhekuo . 1968年, . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw kuwalu (1968) a mihcaan, tawyaay a Czechoslovakia kun-cen-dan sakacacaya a mikawaway ci Du'pu-cieke palekal tu " pulake a satingsing布拉格之春" a sakaudip atu cence' misumada a laylayan, u Sulen caay ka namuh, Sulen midebung tu Slovakia milawlaw, pulake a satingsing namisumad tu laylay hatinitu sa, ciekun sakakaay ci Tupucieke' dakepen patayda i Moscow , Sulan a wayway kahiyaan nu kitakit sasakamuensa nu katuuday. 1989年11月, . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku siwa (1989) a mihcaan cacay a bataan idaw ku cacay a bulad, Czechoslovakia milaheci ku Sezun a kawaw mahedek tu ku kuncen-dan misataaday a centan, cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan (1990) a mihcaan, kanatal a ngangan misumad han u Czechia atu Slovakia lanpan-kunhe-kuo .

Slovakia kakilimaan o Slovakia sa i labo no O-coo, itiza i 48 40 N, 19 30 E. o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa izaw ko 49,035 km2.o ahebal no lala'ay sa izaw ko 48,105 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa izaw ko 930 km2. hamin no tademawan sa 5,445,802. kakalokan omah sa 40.10%, kilakilangan omah sa 40.20%, zomaay henay omah sa 19.70%. nilacol tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Bratislava . kakinginan no kanatal demiad kakinging no kanatal demiad sa 1 bolad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Zozana Čapotová (Sosanna．Capotowa 蘇珊娜·查普托娃), 1973 a mihca 6 a bolad 21 a demiad nalecohan. o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Slovakia ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2019 a mihca 6 bolad 15 demiad. conli o conli no Slovakia ayza sa ci Edoard Heger , micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 4 bolad 1 demiad. Czechoslovakia likisi Czechoslovakia i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko walo (1918) a mihcaan katokoh i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko tosa (1992) a mahcaan o O-coo a kanatal, mabolesak sato tahekl ko tosaay misitekeday a kanatal — Czechia ato Czechoslovakia . Czechoslovakia patideng i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko walo (1918) a mihcaan, itida i Coo-o , o Czechia ato Slovakia misakapot, tawyaay a kanatal no ngangan o Slovensko , itini i cacay katokoh to tosaay a nikalepacawan, tawya namaka celcel henay to saka kitakit no saka pito a tabakiay no kakakolian. itini i saka tosa anikalepacawan, Czechoslovakia a niyado hiyan no Nacoy-Dekoo midebong, itin i kakakoliyana no kakitidaan patideng to Bohemia ato Moravia dadipoten a kanatal ato Czechoslovakia no tosaay a dadadimawan no kanatal, doma a niyadoan hiyan no Poland ato Hongary amikelic. cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan,Czechoslovakia misomad to ngangan o Czechoslovakia siakay coi konhekoo. somamadan a likisi Czechoslovakia a niyado' itida i Ocoo no teban, pisitekedan sa noheni nama hiya no Hapo-sepaw-wancaw patidenga to Awtili-tikoo mikowan makala to tolo a pina (300) a lasobo ko tenes, cacay a malebot walo a lasobo enem a bataan idaw ko pito (1867) a mihcaan Awtlli-tikoo misomad to kapot mala Aw'con-tikoo , Czechia ato Slovakia niyado' mikelic sipabeli i Aostria ato Hongary . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko walo (1918) a mihcaan misatadas malepacaw to hedek, Awcon-tikoo mademec mabolasak, Bohemia , Moravia , Slovakia a niyado' misakapot misitekeday a kanatal, pangangan han o Czechoslovakia . misiteked sato kina kitakit, Czechoslovakia a sakaodip amelik sato mocelak, katokoh to tosa anikalepacawan no kanatal a ayawan, naytini i paykanatal no saka cacay a bataan no kakakolian a saka enem no kasinganganan. cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo tolo a bataan idaw ko walo (1938) a mihcaan, Ing-fa a kanatal ato Germany ato Italy masasolit to Monich a kiyakoan a sasolitan, itini kainaian no Czechoslovakia dayhiw milihida to kawaw panotek to notipanay a lala' Sodetenland kelicen sipabeli i Germany . 1939年3月, . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo tolo a bataan idaw ko siwa (1939) a mihcaan tolo a bolad, Nazi Germany maalato Sodetenland aniyado no likoco, tahekal ko hitay hamin han ko Czechoslovakia mialaw, Germany itini i Czechia patideng to Bohemia ato Moravia madipotay a kanatal, Slovakia mapatideng mahiya no Germany madipotay a Czechoslovakia . Slovakia a niyado' pakilac sipabeli i Germany a cabay to Hongary wan-koo . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo sepat a bataan idaw ko lima (1945) a mihcaan, So-lan pasayda i Don-oo pacoli, o Potsdam nika sasolitan to Czechoslovakia namaka Pragoe notipan hitay no Amilika midebong, mapolong to sodo Pragoe hiyan no So-lan a hitay madebong, Czechia ato Slovakia mapolong aca, kelican no Germany ato Con-yali ko lala' misabalohayaca mibenis to Czechoslovakia , nika Zakarpattia Oblast sipakelic i Soviet Union a Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Repoblic . cacay a malebot siwaw a lasobo sepat a bataan idaw ko enem (1946) a mihcaan lima a bolat, Czechoslovakia itini i United States Soviet Union miliyas sato salihalay sato konoheni misingkiw, koncendan sayadahay ko nisingkiwan a paya tolo a bataan idaw ko walo tin enem a kilac(-38.6%), amica koncendan ko satabakiay no dan nika micokelay a tademaw caay ka papina, nika mihantaya to koncendan a pinapinano centan caay ka balod ko baloco'. sakatosa a mihcaan, Slovakia noodip a kawaw caay henay ka hedaek,sakaodip kangelo' an maconos konikacaay ka holak no kawaw nika itini i Stalin mipenec makai tonipipadan no United States , nina koncendan sifo caay kanamohi no tademaw kaisa midoiy itini i cacay a malebot siw a lasobot sepat a bataan idaw ko walo (1948) a mihcaan lima a bolad miliyawaca misingkiw. nika tawyaay a mihcaan no tosa a bolad, kasaopo no sifo a domaan no tan a sakakaay patahekal to sapiales, midademec to koncendan misa tabaki to kincal misilod to kakawawen, sisa mapalekal ko cence kabaliyawan, koncendan masakapotay miawaw to katooday mocolil palekal miyokiw tina kawawan. imahini o sakakaay katepaan i dadan a mapatay, katooday sakamosa cinida niocolan no sifo mipacok, mahida towaca koncendan palekal mibabelih, onoheni mikowan to aydaay nipisingkiwan, amica ko congli caay sipaliyoni nika sifo mamin to o koncendan kosi kawaway. nika itini i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo sepat a bataan idaw ko walo (1948) a mihcaan tosa a bolad ninakawaw sa, mala Solan a binawlan no sehow coi a kanatal, micomod to Soviet Union patideng to hoasa sasolitan anikasakapot ato sakaodip papadang a wiyonhow. 1960年, . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan Czechoslovakia misomad to ngangan o Czechoslovak malabinawlanay a sakapotan no konhekoo . 1968年, . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo enem a bataan idaw kowalo (1968) a mihcaan, tawyaay a Czechoslovakia kon-cen-dan sakacacaya a mikawaway ci Do'po-cieke palekal to " polake a satingsing布拉格之春" a sakaodip ato cence' misomada a laylayan, o Solen caay ka namoh, Solen midebong to Slovakia milawlaw, polake a satingsing namisomad to laylay hatinito sa, ciekon sakakaay ci Topocieke' dakepen patayda i Moscow , Solan a wayway kahiyaan no kitakit sasakamoensa no katooday. 1989年11月, . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo walo a bataan idaw ko siwa (1989) a mihcaan cacay a bataan idaw ko cacay a bolad, Czechoslovakia milaheci ko Sezon a kawaw mahedek to ko koncen-dan misataaday a centan, cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan (1990) a mihcaan, kanatal a ngangan misomad han o Czechia ato Slovakia lanpan-konhe-koo .
